extension.description: DeSmuME is software that allows you to emulate a Nintendo DS system. And best of all, this software is completely free and open-source.[CR][CR]Special thanks to: yopyop (original author of DeSmuME), for releasing the source code of this great emulator; Martin Korth (author of GBATEK), for his well-written Gameboy Advance and Nintendo DS documentation.[CR][CR]Source: https://github.com/libretro/desmume-libretro
